recoverSeedPhrase_header_subtitleMainSee: Your *Personas* and the following *Accounts* are controlled by your main seed phrase. To recover control, you must re-enter it.
recoverSeedPhrase_header_subtitleOtherSe: The following *Accounts* are controlled by a seed phrase. To recover control, you must re-enter it.
recoverSeedPhrase_skipButton: Skip This Seed Phrase For Now
enterSeedPhrase_warning: For your safety, make sure no one is looking at your screen. Never give your seed phrase to anyone for any reason.
